smooth.ADAM.nobs

property ADAM.nobs: int

Return number of observations used for fitting.

Returns:

Number of in-sample observations.

Return type:

int

Raises:

ValueError – If the model has not been fitted yet.

Examples

>>> model = ADAM(model="AAN")
>>> model.fit(y)
>>> n = model.nobs
